name: Planet Bash
description:
You are the moon of this blue planet and you hate the guys living there and for some reason, they hate you too. This is a little game where you bash the crap out of the planet and its people! Don't worry, they had it coming.Features:
  • Non-stop fast action
  • Full Controller support
  • Original hard rock soundtrack
  • High levels of orbital destruction
  • 5 types of enemies seeking to destroy you
  • Powerups to help you in the fight of planetary destruction
  • Fashionable lunar hats to give you special bonuses and powerups
